slo.description: Handles user checkout and payment processing

objectives.name: db_latency
objectives.description: Ensure database query latency remains under 150ms to support fast transaction processing.

objectives.name: db_error_rate
objectives.description: Ensure database error rate stays below 0.5% to maintain service stability.

explanation: The latency target of 150ms for db_latency is based on the expected query complexity during a checkout process, aiming to minimize user wait times and ensure smooth transaction processing. The error rate target of 0.5% for db_error_rate was set to maintain service stability by minimizing potential database-related failures, assuming proper caching and replication strategies are in place to optimize database performance.
